resources.string:
This icon pack provides Google's beautiful weather icons (v4 design) for Breezy Weather app.

 To use these icons:
 1. Make sure Breezy Weather is installed
 2. Open Breezy Weather
 3. Go to Settings → Appearance → Icon Packs
 4. Select "Google Weather Icons v4"

 The icons feature both day and night variants with transparent backgrounds for the best visual experience.
Breezy Weather is not installed. Opening download page...
